content:
ServiceCredentialsElement Class

Definition

Represents a configuration element that specifies the credential to be used to authenticate the service, as well as client credential validation-related settings. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public class ServiceCredentialsElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement
Inheritance
Object
ConfigurationElement
ServiceModelConfigurationElement
ServiceModelExtensionElement
System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement
ServiceCredentialsElement

Constructors

ServiceCredentialsElement()

Initializes a new instance of the ServiceCredentialsElement class.

public ServiceCredentialsElement ();

Properties

BehaviorType

Gets the type of this behavior configuration element.

public override Type BehaviorType { get; }
Value
Type

The type of the behavior.

ClientCertificate

Gets the client certificate to be used when the client certificate is available out-of-band.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509InitiatorCertificateServiceElement ClientCertificate { get; }
Value
X509InitiatorCertificateServiceElement

A X509InitiatorCertificateServiceElement that specifies the client certificate to be used when the client certificate is available out-of-band.

Remarks

This element also specifies client certificate validation settings.

IdentityConfiguration

Gets or sets the identity configuration used in ServiceCredentialsElement.

public string IdentityConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
String

The identity configuration used.

IssuedTokenAuthentication

Gets the current issued token for this service.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenServiceElement IssuedTokenAuthentication { get; }
Value
IssuedTokenServiceElement

A IssuedTokenServiceElement that specifies the current issued token for this service.

Peer

Gets the current credentials for a peer node.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCredentialElement Peer { get; }
Value
PeerCredentialElement

A PeerCredentialElement that specifies the current credentials for a peer node.

Properties

Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }
Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection

A ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

SecureConversationAuthentication

Gets the current credentials for a secure conversation.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.SecureConversationServiceElement SecureConversationAuthentication { get; }
Value
SecureConversationServiceElement

A SecureConversationServiceElement that specifies the current credentials for a secure conversation.

ServiceCertificate

Gets an X.509 certificate initiated by a client.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement ServiceCertificate { get; }
Value
X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement

A X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement that specifies an X.509 certificate initiated by a client.

Type

Gets or sets the type of this configuration.

public string Type { get; set; }
Value
String

The type of this configuration.

UseIdentityConfiguration

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service credential element uses identity configuration.

public bool UseIdentityConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the service credential element uses identity configuration; otherwise, false.

UserNameAuthentication

Gets the settings for username and password validation.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.UserNameServiceElement UserNameAuthentication { get; }
Value
UserNameServiceElement

A UserNameServiceElement that specifies the settings for username and password validation.

WindowsAuthentication

Gets the settings for Windows credential validation.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WindowsServiceElement WindowsAuthentication { get; }
Value
WindowsServiceElement

A WindowsServiceElement that specifies the settings for Windows credential validation.

Methods

ApplyConfiguration(ServiceCredentials)

Applies the content of a specified configuration element to this configuration element.

protected void ApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials behavior);
behavior
ServiceCredentials

A configuration element to be applied.

CopyFrom(ServiceModelExtensionElement)

Copies the content of a specified configuration element to this configuration element.

public override void CopyFrom (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement from);
from
ServiceModelExtensionElement

The configuration element to be copied.

CreateBehavior()

Creates a custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.

protected override object CreateBehavior ();
Returns
Object

A custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
